content.p: As a manager, you need a great team. But we know itâ€™s not always easy finding the right person for the job. Our recruitment team will help you with assessment and selection solutions that attract and find the best people. The team is also responsible for making sure you comply with relevant legislation and best practice. From advertising to induction, the recruitment service helps you every step of the way. Their support includes: We can also help you use the vacancy manager system and develop campaigns to attract staff. A-Z of services A-Z of policies Forms
